name: phylogenetically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the development of organisms over time, including how they separate into different groups: The hamster and rat are phylogenetically closely related. The H-Y (male) antigen is phylogenetically conserved among vertebrate species.
More examplesFewer examplesThe taste receptors of insects are phylogenetically different from taste receptors of most other animals. Part of a family of hormones, oxytocin can be traced phylogenetically to invertebrates.Mental scene descriptions are necessary for practical tasks of primates, and preexist language phylogenetically.
